description:
This week I wanted to do something a little different so I invited my favorite muscle boy Dylan, his hot little brother Henry, big-dicked-frat-boy Todd, and ex-Army babe Steve over for a "jerk off" contest.
The concept of the contest was simple: the winner was the guy who could cum the farthest. I had the studs line up behind one of those long folding tables. Then one by one they dumped their loads.
Now, you would think I'd be able to pull that off without a hitch. But by the end of this movie I was so totally distracted by the young, naked flesh in front of me and the smell of cum in the air that I actually forgot to formally announce a winner.
So, you'll just have to watch the video and decide for yourself who won...
title: Jerk Off Contest
